11.2 Download

Static Mode

Dynamic Mode

<div class="row">
<div style="text-align:center;" class="col-md-6"><button id="psdwl" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg">€ 199,99</button></div>
<div style="text-align:center;" class="col-md-6"><button id="psdwl-2" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg"></button></div>
</div>
<script class="text/javascript">
    $( document ).ready( function () {
    $("#psdwl").psdwl({});   $("#psdwl-2").psdwl({
                               text: '€199,99',
                               hover: 'discover',
                               default: false
                             });
     });
</script>
